media.Author: Sunda Language
media.Summary: MP3 training files from the International School of Missions, in both English and Sunda. Speakers include Jack Hayford, Dr. Reinhard Bonnke and Bayless Conley.

media.Name: English Radio Programs
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: Various English language programs, mainly verse-by-verse teaching by John Edmiston and other pastors.

media.Name: Harvestime Audio
media.Author: Vince Rizzo
media.Summary: Dr. Vince Rizzo reads the Harvestime manuals which are very practical training in evangelism and church-planting along with basic Bible-teaching.

series.Name: General Teaching on Prayer and on Faith
series.Author: John Edmiston

media.Name: Praying For Those Who Persecute Us
media.Author: John Edmiston

media.Name: How To Pray For Peace In Your Life
media.Author: John Edmiston

category.Name: Insights for Eternity
category.Author: John Edmiston
category.Summary: 30 minute Bible-teaching programs by John Edmiston, teaching those who teach others.

media.Name: The Anti-Christ and the False Prophet
media.Author: John Edmiston

media.Name: The Gathering In Of The Saints
media.Author: John Edmiston

category.Name: The One Another Commandments
category.Author: John Edmiston
category.Summary: 30 minute programs on the 'one another' commandments in the New Testament such as love one another, encourage one another etc.

media.Name: Be At Peace With One Another
media.Author: John Edmiston

category.Name: Spiritual Discernment For Pastors
category.Author: John Edmiston
category.Summary: 12 programs (30 minutes each) about cults, false teaching and spiritual deception to help pastors with issues of spiritual error in their churches

series.Name: Spiritual Discernment For Pastors
series.Author: John Edmiston
series.Summary: 12 programs (30 minutes each) about cults, false teaching and spiritual deception to help pastors with issues of spiritual error in their churches

media.Name: Tests of True and False Doctrine from the Book of 1 John
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: The tests of true doctrine from the book of 1 John which are having faith in Jesus, and believing that Jesus is the Son of God, Jesus has come in the flesh, and that Jesus is the Christ.

media.Name: How To Distinguish Between True and False Christians
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: This program looks at how to tell the difference between a true Christian and a false Christian. The tests, in 1 John are: continued fellowship with the saints, righteousness, love, and the presence of the Holy Spirit in the life of the believer.

media.Name: How Spiritual Deception Operates
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: Examines how spiritual deception operates, the tactics of wolves in sheep's clothing, the promotion of lawlessness and the promotion of false claims by false apostles.

media.Name: False Miracles in the End Times
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: There are nine Bible passages that talk about false miracles in the End Times and how the Anti-Christ and the False Prophet will use them to try to deceive Christians.

media.Name: How Cults Manipulate People
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: Cults try to manipulate people by controlling their emotions, behavior, relationships, thinking and their access to information. This program exposes these evil tactics.

media.Name: The Danger of Conspiracy Theories
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: Isaiah chapter eight tells us not to pay attention to conspiracy theories but to put our trust in God and not to fear people or princes. This program helps Christian to put these conspiracy theories aside and to be mentally healthy.

media.Name: Three Dimensions of Crazy Cult Thinking
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: This program explains how cults think and what is wrong with it, how to discern it and avoid it and how to operate in the love of God instead of the fearful cult mindset.

media.Name: Commerical Cults
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: Some cults look like businesses and take over people's lives with promises of wealth from their sales program. Then they become life-dominating and damaging.

media.Name: What is Wrong with the Occult
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: The Bible strictly forbids participation in the occult, witchcraft, casting spells. fortune-telling, astrology and divination. This programs explains those Scriptures.

media.Name: The Difference Between True and False Revival
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: Some so-called revivals are false and do not lead to repentance and true faith. Learn the difference between true godly revival and fake shallow, manipulative revival.

media.Name: The Prosperity Gospel is a False Gospel
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: God does indeed prosper us, but not in the way claimed by the preachers of the prosperity gospel that has led so many Christians astray from the faith.

media.Name: Magicians or Christians? Jannes and Jambres, Simon Magus
media.Author: John Edmiston
media.Summary: The Bible records the Egyptian magicians who opposed Moses and the Samaritan magician who opposed Peter and John and the magician Bar-Jesus who opposed Paul. This program shows the difference between magic and Christianity.

category.Name: Harvestime Audio
category.Author: Vince Rizzo
category.Summary: downloadable MP3 files where Dr. Vince Rizzo reads the Harvestime manuals which are very practical training in evangelism and church-planting along with basic Bible-teaching.

series.Name: Old Testament Survey
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This survey provides an overview of the entire Bible. Study outlines of each book of the Bible are provided for further development by the student.

series.Name: New Testament Survey
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This survey provides an overview of the entire Bible. Study outlines of each book of the Bible are provided for further development by the student.

series.Name: Creative Bible Study Methods
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This course equips students for personal study of the Word of God after the conclusion of Institute training. Students learn how to study the Bible by book, chapter, paragraph, verse, and word. Other methods taught include biographical, devotional, theological, typological, and topical. Special guidelines for studying Bible poetry and prophecy are presented and students are taught methods of charting and outlining.

series.Name: Foundation of Faith
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This course stresses the importance of proper spiritual foundations for life and ministry by focusing on foundations of the Christian faith identified in Hebrews 6:1: Repentance, faith, baptism, laying on of hands, resurrection, and eternal judgment.

series.Name: Developing A Biblical Worldview
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This course examines the Biblical world view from Genesis through Revelation. God's plan for the nations of the world from the beginning of time is detailed. Current worldwide spiritual need is also presented.

series.Name: Kingdom Living
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: The 'Gospel of the Kingdom' shall be preached in all the world before the return of the Lord Jesus Christ (Matthew 24:14). Understanding of Kingdom principles is necessary if one is to spread the Gospel of the Kingdom. This course focuses on patterns and principles of Kingdom living applicable to life and ministry.

series.Name: Knowing God's Voice
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This course explains how God speaks to men today and how to find His general and specific plans for life. A Christian model for decision making is presented, along with guidelines for overcoming wrong decisions, steps to take if you have missed the will of God, and methods for dealing with questionable practices.

series.Name: Ministry of the Holy Spirit
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This study focuses on the ministry of the Holy Spirit, spiritual fruit, and spiritual gifts. Students are guided in discovery of their own spiritual gifts and position of ministry in the Body of Christ.

series.Name: Spiritual Warfare
series.Author: Vince Rizzo
series.Summary: This course moves participants beyond the natural world into the realm of the spirit. Tactics of the enemy are analyzed and strategies of spiritual warfare assuring victory over the principalities and powers of the spirit world are explained.
